name: Pinto Bean Soup -- Sopa Tarasca
description: Sopa Tarasca is one of Mexico's most popular soups -- a delightfully satiating pinto bean soup that will keep you coming back for more. So good!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon Mexican oregano (plus more to taste)
Crema ((or heavy cream, or sour cream))

recipeInstructions.text: Roast 3 plum tomatoes in the oven at 400F for 15-20 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Roast 3 plum tomatoes in the oven at 400F for 15-20 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Add the roasted tomatoes to a blender along with 1/2 onion, 2 garlic cloves, and 1 small chipotle in adobo with the seeds scraped out. Combine well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the roasted tomatoes to a blender along with 1/2 onion, 2 garlic cloves, and 1 small chipotle in adobo with the seeds scraped out. Combine well.

recipeInstructions.text: Saute tomato mixture in a dollop of oil over medium heat for a few minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Saute tomato mixture in a dollop of oil over medium heat for a few minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, in a blender add 2 cups of pinto beans along with 2 cups of stock and combine well.  (When using canned beans I usually drain and rinse them first.)
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, in a blender add 2 cups of pinto beans along with 2 cups of stock and combine well.  (When using canned beans I usually drain and rinse them first.)

recipeInstructions.text: Add bean puree to the tomato mixture along with 1/2 teaspoon salt, some freshly cracked pepper, and 1/2 teaspoon Mexican oregano.  Combine well and let simmer for 5-10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add bean puree to the tomato mixture along with 1/2 teaspoon salt, some freshly cracked pepper, and 1/2 teaspoon Mexican oregano.  Combine well and let simmer for 5-10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Take a final taste for seasoning.  (I added another pinch of salt to this batch.)
recipeInstructions.name: Take a final taste for seasoning.  (I added another pinch of salt to this batch.)

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately and garnish with your choice of Crema, lime juice, hot sauce, finely diced cilantro stems, and freshly cracked black pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately and garnish with your choice of Crema, lime juice, hot sauce, finely diced cilantro stems, and freshly cracked black pepper.
